objects.name: Network Traffic Flow
objects.description: Summarized network packet data that captures session-level details such as source/destination IPs, ports, protocol types, timestamps, and data volume, without storing full packet payloads. This is commonly used for traffic analysis, anomaly detection, and network performance monitoring.

x_mitre_log_sources.name: Network Traffic
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: None
